thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Winsan Shanghai Medical Science and Technology to swing to profit in FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Winsan Shanghai Medical Science and Technology to swing to profit in FY 2017

organizations.name: winsan shanghai medical science and technology co ltd

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Winsan Shanghai Medical Science and Technology Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to be 41 million yuan to 53 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net loss was 56.9 million yuan
* The main reasons for the forecast are improved medical informatization business and contribution from investment return
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/7pR4SL
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
